code:
%% Connection flowchart
flowchart TD
  subgraph Client[Retail_Inventory]
    C1[Retail_CouponSystem]
    C2[Retail_CouponSystem]
    C3[Retail_CouponSystem]
    C4[Retail_CouponSystem]
    C5[Retail_OrderManagement]
  end

  subgraph Server[Retail_OrderManagement]
    S1[Retail_PointOfSale]
    S2{Retail_PointOfSale}
    S3[Retail_CouponSystem]
    S4[Retail_CustomerLoyalty]
    S5[Retail_PointOfSale]
    S6[Retail_OrderManagement]
  end

  C1 --> C2 --> C3 --> S1
  S1 -->|invalid| Drop[Retail_PointOfSale]
  S1 --> S2
  S2 -- yes --> S3 --> S4 --> C5
  S2 -- no --> S5

  C5 -- piggyback --> S1
  C5 -- no_outgoing --> ExplicitACK[Retail_CustomerLoyalty] --> S1
  C4 --> C3

  S6 --> Close[Retail_Inventory]
